instruction:

the object {"foo": ["bar", "baz"]} is a well-formatted instance of the schema. The object {"properties": {"foo": ["bar", "baz"]}} is not well-formatted.

", "type": "string"}, "province": {"title": "Province", "description": "answer to which province is the sentiment associated with.", "type": "string"}, "keyword": {"title": "Keyword", "description": "The keywords related to the sentiment.     user query: Analyze the given sentiment content. provide a paragraph output of the sentiment analysis results, including the following aspects: whether the sentiment is positive or negative, the province associated with the sentiment, the keywords related to the sentiment, the impact of the sentiment on users, whether it is a major sentiment, and whether manual follow-up is required. Every aspect needs to be as detailed as possible. Sentiment content:中国移动四川公司以“5G+工业互联网”双引擎发力，为“制造”到“智造”蝶变转型注入强大动力。在成都，为微网优联科技（成都）有限公司构建起了以5G生产办公共用一张网、5G+智慧仓储与自动化包装、5G+成品组测等步骤为核心的5G+生产运营模式，实现生产检测、仓储管理等自动化、数字化、智能化，微网优联生产效率比传统工艺提升了40%，产品质检准确率提升至99.5%以上；在崇州，与捷普工厂积极探索，结合5G、AI、大数据等创新技术，通过“数据”驱动工厂研发、生产、制造、营销、管理，将工厂打造为一个设备维护“智能化”、数据采集“实时化”、工厂生产“透明化”、决策管理“数据化”的现代“数字”工厂。一系列的数字化、智能化转型举措，为“黑灯工厂”和智能制造增添了一抹新亮色。
output:
"
Output:
{
    "sentiment": "positive",
    "province": "Sichuan",
    "keyword": "5G+, Industrial Internet, Automation, Digitalization, Intelligent Manufacturing, Data-driven, Smart Factory",
    "impactOnUsers": "The introduction of 5G+ Industrial Internet and other innovative technologies has enabled the transformation from traditional manufacturing to intelligent manufacturing, resulting in increased production efficiency by 40%, improved product quality inspection accuracy to 99.5%, and the establishment of a modern digital factory with intelligent equipment maintenance, real-time data collection, transparent production, and data-driven decision-making.",
    "isMajor": "Yes, it is a major sentiment as it is a significant transformation from traditional manufacturing to intelligent manufacturing, which has a great impact on users.",
    "manualFollow": "No, manual follow-up is not required as the transformation is already in progress."
}"

Sentiment content:近日，由内蒙古自治区通信管理局、黑龙江省通信管理局联合主办，2023年跨行业跨地区森林防灭火应急通信实战演练在内蒙古自治区呼伦贝尔市大兴安岭莫尔道嘎林场举办。本次演练模拟受雷击影响，围绕发现火情、建立指挥通信、组建公网通信三个环节分五个科目开展。中国移动内蒙古公司组织保障队伍、车辆及各种专业设备火速集结现场开展保障工作。本次演练共出动航拍勘察无人机、系留式无人机、和对讲机、干线高精度光纤熔接机14台，4G静中通卫星通信车、4/5G高通量静中通卫星通信车2辆，天通1号卫星电话5部，冲锋舟1艘，5G超视距微波1套。演练期间，中国移动内蒙古公司作为全国首个使用中星26高通量卫星装备配合系留式无人机高空基站恢复公网通信的运营商，得到主办方及观摩单位的一致好评。
output:
"
Output:
{
    "sentiment": "positive",
    "province": "Inner Mongolia",
    "keyword": "forest fire prevention, emergency communication, aerial survey, unmanned aerial vehicle, satellite communication, microwave",
    "impactOnUsers": "The drill simulated the impact of lightning strikes and focused on discovering fires, establishing command communication, and establishing public network communication. China Mobile Inner Mongolia Company organized a team, vehicles and various professional equipment to quickly assemble the site to provide support. During the drill, China Mobile Inner Mongolia Company was praised by the organizers and observers for being the first operator in the country to use ChinaSat 26 high-throughput satellite equipment to cooperate with the fixed-wing unmanned aerial vehicle high-altitude base station to restore public network communication.",
    "isMajor": "Yes, this drill is a major sentiment as it is the first time China Mobile Inner Mongolia Company used ChinaSat 26 high-throughput satellite equipment to cooperate with the fixed-wing unmanned aerial vehicle high-altitude base station to restore public network communication.",
    "manualFollow": "No, manual follow-up is not required as the drill was successful and praised by the organizers and observers."
}"
